text: The conversation started with a tool result containing information about the Docker image and container settings for various PostgreSQL, Neo4j, and QDRant images. The settings include port mappings, volumes, healthchecks, and restart options for each service. There are also specific environment variables used to configure the services, such as POSTGRES_USER, NEO4J_USERNAME, and NEO4J_PASSWORD.
content:
USER: [{'tool_use_id': 'toolu_01KUGJ9RHBFi9PnJ8TFCJu9Q', 'type': 'tool_result', 'content': '     1→services:
     2→  # ============= Data Stores =============
     3→
     4→  postgres:
     5→    image: pgvector/pgvector:0.8.1-pg18-trixie
     6→    container_name: pgvector_db
     7→    environment:
     8→      POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}
     9→      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-postgres}
    10→      POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB:-memories}
    11→    ports:
    12→      - "8432:5432"
    13→    volumes:
    14→      - pgdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    15→    healthcheck:
    16→      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}"]
    17→      interval: 10s
    18→      timeout: 5s
    19→      retries: 5
    20→    networks:
    21→      - wolf-logic-net
    22→    restart: unless-stopped
    23→
    24→  neo4j:
    25→    image: neo4j:ubi9
    26→    container_name: neo4j_graph
    27→    environment:
    28→      NEO4J_AUTH: ${NEO4J_USERNAME:-neo4j}/${NEO4J_PASSWORD:-mem0graph}
    29→      NEO4J_PLUGINS: '["apoc"]'
    30→      NEO4J_apoc_export_file_enabled: "true"
    31→      NEO4J_apoc_import_file_enabled: "true"
    32→    ports:
    33→      - "7474:7474"
    34→      - "7687:7687"
    35→    volumes:
    36→      - neo4jdata:/data
    37→    healthcheck:
    38→      test: ["CMD", "wget", "http://localhost:7474", "-q", "-O", "-"]
    39→      interval: 10s
    40→      timeout: 5s
    41→      retries: 5
    42→    networks:
    43→      - wolf-logic-net
    44→    restart: unless-stopped
    45→
    46→  qdrant:
    47→    image: qdrant/qdrant:dev
    48→    container_name: qdrant_vector
    49→    ports:
    50→      - "6333:6333"
    51→      - "6334:6334"
    52→    volumes:
    53→      - qdrantdata:/qdrant/storage
    54→    healthcheck:
    55→      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:6333/health"]
    56→      interval: 10s
    57→      timeout: 5s
    58→      retries: 5
    59→    networks:
    60→      - wolf-logic-net
    61→    restart: unless-stopped
    62→
    63→  # ============= Applications =============
    64→
    65→  # MCP Connection Service (Model Context Protocol) - Port 8765
    66→  mcp:
    67→    build:
    68→      context: .
    69→      dockerfile: server/dev.Dockerfile
    70→    container_name: mcp_server
    71→    depends_on:
    72→      postgres:
    73→        condition: service_healthy
    74→      neo4j:
    75→        condition: service_healthy
    76→      qdrant:
    77→        condition: service_healthy
    78→    environment:
    79→      POSTGRES_HOST: postgres
    80→      POSTGRES_PORT: 5432
    81→      POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}
    82→      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-postgres}
    83→      POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB:-memories}
    84→      NEO4J_URI: bolt://neo4j:7687
    85→      NEO4J_USERNAME: ${NEO4J_USERNAME:-neo4j}
    86→      NEO4J_PASSWORD: ${NEO4J_PASSWORD:-mem0graph}
    87→    ports:
    88→      - "8765:8765"
    89→    volumes:
    90→      - ./server:/app
    91→      - ./history:/app/history
    92→    command: python -m uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8765 --reload
    93→    networks:
    94→      - wolf-logic-net
    95→    healthcheck:
    96→      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:8765/health"]
    97→      interval: 10s
    98→      timeout: 5s
    99→      retries: 5
   100→    restart: unless-stopped
   101→
   102→  # FastAPI Memory API - REST API - Port 8888
   103→  api:
   104→    build:
   105→      context: .
   106→      dockerfile: server/dev.Dockerfile
   107→    container_name: fastapi_backend
   108→    depends_on:
   109→      postgres:
   110→        condition: service_healthy
   111→      neo4j:
   112→        condition: service_healthy
   113→      qdrant:
   114→        condition: service_healthy
   115→    environment:
   116→      POSTGRES_HOST: postgres
   117→      POSTGRES_PORT: 5432
   118→      POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}
   119→      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-postgres}
   120→      POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB:-memories}
   121→      NEO4J_URI: bolt://neo4j:7687
   122→      NEO4J_USERNAME: ${NEO4J_USERNAME:-neo4j}
   123→      NEO4J_PASSWORD: ${NEO4J_PASSWORD:-mem0graph}
   124→    ports:
   125→      - "8888:8000"
   126→    volumes:
   127→      - ./server:/app
   128→      - ./history:/app/history
   129→    command: uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
   130→    networks:
   131→      - wolf-logic-net
   132→    healthcheck:
   133→      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:8000/health"]
   134→      interval: 10s
   135→      timeout: 5s
   136→      retries: 5
   137→    restart: unless-stopped
   138→
   139→  # Time Sync Server - Port 8900
   140→  timesync:
   141→    build:
   142→      context: .
   143→      dockerfile: server/dev.Dockerfile
   144→    container_name: timesync_server
   145→    depends_on:
   146→      postgres:
   147→        condition: service_healthy
   148→    environment:
   149→      TIMESYNC_PORT: "8900"
   150→    ports:
   151→      - "8900:8900"
   152→    volumes:
   153→      - ./server:/app
   154→    command: uvicorn timesync_app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8900 --reload
   155→    networks:
   156→      - wolf-logic-net
   157→    healthcheck:
   158→      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:8900/health"]
   159→      interval: 10s
   160→      timeout: 5s
   161→      retries: 5
   162→    restart: unless-stopped
   163→
   164→  # Flask Dashboard UI - Port 3000
   165→  web:
   166→    build:
   167→      context: .
   168→      dockerfile: wolf-logic/ui-flask/Dockerfile
   169→    container_name: flask_frontend
   170→    depends_on:
   171→      api:
   172→        condition: service_healthy
   173→    environment:
   174→      # API Configuration - use Docker service names
   175→      MEMORY_API_URL: http://api:8000
   176→      PGVECTOR_URL: postgresql://postgres:postgres@postgres:5432/memories
   177→      USER_ID: cadillacthewolf
   178→      # Flask Config
   179→      DEBUG: "True"
   180→      SECRET_KEY: wolf-logic-secret-key
   181→      PORT: "3000"
   182→    ports:
   183→      - "3000:3000"
   184→    volumes:
   185→      - ./wolf-logic/ui-flask:/app
   186→    networks:
   187→      - wolf-logic-net
   188→    healthcheck:
   189→      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3000"]
   190→      interval: 30s
   191→      timeout: 10s
   192→      retries: 3
   193→    restart: unless-stopped
   194→
   195→# ============= Volumes =============
   196→
   197→volumes:
   198→  pgdata:
   199→    driver: local
   200→  neo4jdata:
   201→    driver: local
   202→  qdrantdata:
   203→    driver: local
   204→
   205→# ============= Networks =============
   206→
   207→networks:
   208→  wolf-logic-net:
   209→    driver: bridge
   210→
   211→

'}]
keywords: Here are the 8 key topics/keywords extracted from this conversation

sentiment.analysis:
The sentiment of this conversation appears to be neutral, as it is providing technical instructions for setting up multiple data storage services (PostgreSQL, Neo4j, and Qdrant). There are no explicit emotional or subjective statements that would indicate a positive or negative sentiment.

However, the content suggests a positive tone because it demonstrates confidence in the setup process by using clear instructions and providing detailed information about each service configuration. The use of commands like `unless-stopped` for restarting services also indicates an expectation that these services will be running consistently. Overall, the conversation is focused on providing technical details and does not explicitly convey positive or negative emotions.

Rating: 3 (Neutral)
